summary: The diff implements all four requirements comprehensively. REQ-1 (replace fabricated statistics with aspirational copy) is addressed in HomePage, Footer, Header, and LandingPage. REQ-2 (UI polish) is addressed via index.css, tailwind.config.js, and all component files. REQ-3 (hero redesign) is addressed in HomePage.tsx with full-width layout, gradient background, hero image, and aspirational headline. REQ-4 (footer enhancement) is addressed in Footer.tsx with mission CTA banner and honest tagline. The two required images are referenced in the code. No significant missing requirements or hallucinated features are detected.
